mikels12 - Your xbox does need to be modded to play this look at http://www.productwiki.com/microsoft-xbox/article/how-to-go-from-xbox-to-xbox-media-center-in-30-minutes.html

kinang26 - This is for the original xbox and can't speak for it running on the 360. I am 99% sure it won't. Now you can run Unsigned code on a 360, but you got to jump trough a lot of hoops to do it and i am sure they will have to rewrite all the emulators to get them to work on the 360.

Bigcrunkone - This will run from the hard drive or a disc. Might need to build an xiso of the emulator with cxbox tool or Qwix to get to load.
